That's right, and well done for checking ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Policy now is that under-18s shouldn't reveal personal details, but 13 is the actual age limit for using the forum.  It's a clarification based on our understanding of the law and Squad's desire to protect underage users.
In a follow-up to kep's question: What's your favorite post, period? Rule-breaking or rule-following

OK, I do have a real question about the forum... it concerns fonts. When I write a chapter in Emiko Station, I usually start it with a small quote from a song or classic novel... Now, when I'm writing a chapter on my computer, I have about a dozen fonts to choose from. The text is in Arial, but I do the quote using Comic Sans MS.<font face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"> However... I chimed in from my phone the other day, and I noticed the quote is in a much fancier font... some sort of pretty cursive. While I don't have a problem with this, it's got me wondering... why would the font be different? Is it my phone? Oh, I have an LG-7... and would other phones, or perhaps a laptop, have an even different font?  </font>

Just curious...
